Name: Illusion
Effect:
You start combat disguised as another party member of choice and gain the following effects:
- You gain 1 point of evasion.
- If a foe wants to target you/said party member, they have to select randomly on who they target.
Both effects are lost when taking damage from an attacking move.
Description: The Pokemon casts an illusion on itself to look like another creature it has seen. The illusion is indistinguishable from the real one.
